Free KeyLogger is an essential software that helps users monitor keystrokes made on a computer. It is a useful tool for parents who want to keep an eye on what their children are doing online. It is also ideal for small-business owners who want to monitor employee computer activities. The software offers various features that make it easy to monitor keystrokes on a computer. This article explores Free KeyLogger and highlights its features and benefits.

## What is Free KeyLogger for Windows?

Free KeyLogger is a powerful software that enables users to monitor keystrokes made on a computer. It tracks all user activities, including passwords, emails, and chats, among others. The software runs in the background and is invisible to the user. It captures all keystrokes made on the computer and logs them in a text file. Users can then view the log file to see what keystrokes were made.

## Features of Free KeyLogger for Windows

Free KeyLogger offers various features that make it easy to monitor keystrokes made on a computer. Some of these features include:

### Stealth mode

The software runs in the background and is invisible to the user. It does not appear in the task manager or the system tray. This feature makes it difficult for the user to discover that they are being monitored.

### Automatic startup

Free KeyLogger starts automatically when the computer boots up. This feature ensures that the software is always running, even if the user restarts the computer.

### Password protection

Users can set a password to protect the log file. This feature ensures that only authorized users can view the log file.

### Email notifications

Users can set the software to send email notifications when specific keywords are typed. For example, parents can set the software to send an email notification when their child types in specific keywords such as "drugs" or "sex".

## Benefits of Using Free KeyLogger for Windows

Free KeyLogger offers various benefits that make it an essential tool for parents and small-business owners. Some of these benefits include:

### Monitor computer activities

Users can monitor their children's computer activities to ensure they are not engaging in harmful online activities. Small-business owners can monitor employee activities to ensure they are not wasting time on non-work-related activities.

### Protect confidential information

Free KeyLogger can help protect confidential information by monitoring who is accessing it. Users can track login credentials, including usernames and passwords, to ensure authorized personnel are accessing sensitive information.

### Improve productivity

Small-business owners can use Free KeyLogger to monitor employee productivity. They can identify employees who are wasting time on non-work-related activities and take corrective action.

### Easy to use

Free KeyLogger is easy to install and use. Users can install the software and start monitoring keystrokes in minutes.

## Conclusion

Free KeyLogger for Windows is a useful software that enables users to monitor keystrokes made on a computer. It offers various features that make it easy to monitor computer activities. The software is an essential tool for parents and small-business owners who want to monitor online activities and protect sensitive information. With Free KeyLogger, users can improve productivity and ensure that their children and employees are safe.
